samples.name: Basic Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design basic card and weather layout card in JavaScript platform. The component is pure CSS component and more flexible.

samples.name: Vertical Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design a business card and profile card using a vertical layout of card component in JavaScript platform.

samples.name: Horizontal Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design product card with icon and its specification using horizontal layout in card component in JavaScript platform.

samples.name: Swipeable Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design a stacked card with swipeable action and corresponding images using card component in JavaScript platform.

samples.name: Flip Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to achieve flip behavior to the card to show hidden information which is on a back side on the card in JavaScript platform.

samples.name: Reveal Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to render a card with reveal layouts, hidden information can be revealed while action on “Know more” in JavaScript platform.

samples.name: Tile View
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design tile-view with filtering and searching using a template engine, data manager, and card component in JavaScript platform.
